---
id: receiver-recurring-consent-webhook
title: "Recurring consent webhook"
description: "We send a webhook for every change made to the receiver's Recurring Consent."
sidebar_label: "Recurring consent webhook"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "event api-method"
info_path: reference/open-finance/btg-pactual-banking-as-a-service-openfinance
custom_edit_url: null
proxy: https://proxy.writechoice.io/
---

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Recurring consent webhook"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"event"}
  path={"webhook"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



We send a webhook for every change made to the receiver's Recurring Consent. 
When the request status is ERROR, there will be an errorCode and an errorDescription, which can be:
    

| Error Code | Error Description |
|----------|:-------------|
|PBE304|Data not found|
|PBE304|ConsentId Not Found|
|PCE005|Duplicated ClientRequestId|
|PBE1001|AccountId not found|
|PBE7036|Error on Get Client Parameter|
|PIE002|Error calling internal api|
|PIE001|Invalid request parameter format|
|PBE002|Openbanking integration fail, request unauthorized.|
|PCE427|Invalid Parameter|
|PBE352|Integration request failed|
|PCE400|Request is invalid, Is not a scheduled payment.|
|PCE426|Payment status not allowed for cancellation.|
|PBE1804|Payment Callback Redirect URL is not CONFIRMED.|

You can sign this webhook in the logged area of this portal or via [API](https://developer.btgpactual.com/doccm#tag/Webhook), with the entity ```ReceiverRecurringConsent```. You can also configure the security validation method for the requests, which can be either ```mTLS Certificate``` or ```Hash Signature (HMAC SHA256 Hash)```.

For more information on the security validation methods, check the ```AUTHORIZATIONS``` section below.

For more information on webhooks, see the [Webhook Documentation](https://developer.btgpactual.com/doccm#tag/Webhook).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

Required for the following account types: CACC, SVGS.","type":"string"},"number":{"description":"Account number, with a check digit (if it exists), if there is an alphanumeric value, it must be converted to 0.","type":"string"},"accountType":{"description":"Types of accounts: \r\n\r\nCACC (Current Account).\r\n SVGS (Savings Account).\r\nTRAN (Transacting Account - Prepaid Payment Account)","enum":["CACC","SVGS","TRAN"],"type":"string","title":"ObkAccountType"}},"title":"ObkRecRecurringAccount"},"rejection":{"description":"Consent rejection information. This is returned only if the consent was rejected.","type":"object","properties":{"rejectedBy":{"description":"The party who rejected the consent","enum":["INICIADORA","USUARIO","DETENTORA"],"type":"string","title":"RecurringConsentRejectedBy"},"rejectedFrom":{"description":"Channel where the rejection started","enum":["INICIADORA","DETENTORA"],"type":"string","title":"RecurringConsentRejectedFrom"},"rejectedAt":{"description":"Date and time that the consent was rejected","type":"string","format":"date","title":"RecurringConsentRejectedAt"},"reason":{"description":"Reason for the consent rejection","type":"object","properties":{"code":{"description":"The code that describes the reason for the rejection.
